content:
```text
EXISTING STRUCTURES
###Copper plate mine at position(x=-21.0, y=-50.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=-21.0, y=-50.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=-19.5, y=-49.5) that puts from the mining drill
###Furnace at position(x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
Consists of following entities
- Furnace (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=-13.5, y=-49.5) that puts into the wooden chest
- Burner inserter (position x=-18.5, y=-48.5) that puts into the wooden chest
###Wooden chest at position(x=-14.5, y=-48.5)
Consists of following entities
- Wooden chest (position x=-14.5, y=-48.5)

ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using extracting but being too far
 -  Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items
### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place a entity to a tile before attempting placing
### Errors when getting an entity that does not exist
- Ensure that the entity exists in the position before attempting to get it
### Errors when placing an entity too far away
- Move closer to the target position before attempting to place the entity. The maximum placement distance is 10.

NAMESPACE
- No new utility functions have been defined.
- No important variables have been assigned.
```
